item.cofh_archery.blaze_arrow.desc: Ignites target and blocks on impact.
item.cofh_archery.diamond_arrow.desc: Deals more damage and also pierces.
item.cofh_archery.frost_arrow.desc: Chills target and freezes blocks on impact.
item.cofh_archery.lightning_arrow.desc: Calls down a lightning bolt on impact.
item.cofh_archery.magma_arrow.desc: Like a Slime Arrow. Less bounce, more fire.
item.cofh_archery.slime_arrow.desc: Bounces a number of times. Low damage, high knockback.
item.cofh_archery.training_arrow.desc: Deals no damage, used for practice.
